extendedInfo.description: If you are Michael Jackson's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Michael Jackson's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Michael Jackson's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Michael Jackson's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Got to Be There- Ben- Music & Me- Forever, Michael- Off the Wall- Thriller- Bad- Dangerous- HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I- Blood on the Dance Floor: HIStory in the Mix- Invincible- The Ultimate Collection- Michael- Bad 25-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - (I Can't Make It) Another Day- (I Like) The Way You Love Me- 2 Bad- 2000 Watts- Ain't No Sunshine- Al Capone- All The Things You Are- Another Part Of Me- Baby Be Mine- Bad- Beat It- Beautiful Girl- Behind The Mask- Ben- Best Of Joy- Billie Jean- Black Or White- Blood On The Dance Floor- Break Of Dawn- Breaking News- Burn The Disco Out- Butterflies- Can't Let Her Get Away- Carousel- Cheater- Childhood- Cinderella Stay Awhile- Come Together- Cry- D.S.- Dangerous- Dapper Dan (Freestyle)- Dear Michael- Dirty Diana- Doggin' Around- Don't Be Messin' 'Round- Don't Stop 'Til You Get Enough- Don't Walk Away- Earth Song- Euphoria- Everybody's Somebody's Fool- Fall Again- Fly Away- Free- Get On the Floor- Ghosts- Girl Don't Take Your Love From Me- Girlfriend- Give In To Me- Gone Too Soon- Got To Be There- Happy- Heal The World- Heartbreaker- Heaven Can Wait- HIStory- Hold My Hand- Hollywood Tonight- Human Nature- I Can't Help It- I Just Can't Stop Loving You- I Wanna Be Where You Are- I'll Come Home To You- I'm So Blue- In Our Small Way- In The Back- In The Closet- Invincible- Is It Scary?- It's The Falling In Love- Jam- Je Ne Veux Pas La Fin De Nous- Johnny Raven- Just A Little Bit Of You- Just Good Friends- Keep The Faith- Keep Your Head Up- Leave Me Alone- Liberian Girl- Little Susie- Love Is Here And Now You're Gone- Man In The Mirror- Maria (You Were The Only One)- Money- Monkey Business- Monster- Morning Glow- Morphine- Much Too Soon- Music & Me- My Girl- Off The Wall- One Day In Your Life- P.Y.T. (Pretty Young Thing)- People Make The World Go Round- Price Of Fame- Privacy- Remember The Time- Rock With You- Rockin' Robin- Scared Of The Moon- Scream- She Drives Me Wild- She's Out Of My Life- Shoo-Be-Doo-Be-Doo-Da-Day- Smile- Smooth Criminal- Someone In The Dark- Song Groove (A/K/A Abortion Papers)- Speechless- Speed Demon- Speed Demon (Nero Remix)- Stranger In Moscow- Streetwalker- Sunset Driver- Superfly Sister- Tabloid Junkie- Take Me Back- The Girl Is Mine- The Greatest Show On Earth- The Lady In My Life- The Lost Children- The Way You Love Me- The Way You Make Me Feel- They Don't Care About Us- This Time Around- Threatened- Thriller- Todo Mi Amor Eres TÃº- Too Young- Unbreakable- Up Again- Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'- We Are Here To Change The World- We're Almost There- We've Got A Good Thing Going- We've Got Forever- We've Had Enough- What Goes Around Comes Around- Whatever Happens- Who Is It- Why You Wanna Trip On Me- Will You Be There- Wings Of My Love- With A Child's Heart- Working Day And Night- You Are My Life- You Are Not Alone- You Are There- You Can Cry On My Shoulder- You Rock My World- You've Got A Friend- Twelve O'clock- Why- Xscape- All In Your Name

reviews.title: Perfect!! :)
reviews.comment: A must have app for any Michael Jackson fan <3.

reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.title: Need more lyrics/albums
reviews.comment: I\'m a huge fan of MJ but I noticed that the albums \"Michael Jackson\'s This Is It\" and \"Number Ones\" are not present. Hope you add it on the next update
